key_features: Color Coded Thick Vinyl Coating For Comfortable And Non-Slip Feel
Hexagon Shaped Edges For Easy Storage And Prevent Rolling
ai_description: The product features a pair of black dumbbells with the KAKSS brand printed in white on the hexagonal ends, indicating a 4KG weight. The dumbbells have a vinyl-coated surface for a comfortable, non-slip grip. Their hexagon-shaped edges prevent rolling and allow for stable storage. The construction includes a professional-grade cast-iron core, ensuring durability for gym exercises.
